Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) offer a number of advantages beyond those of most other fuel cells.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: However, like other fuel cells, rapid load following is difficult, and can lead to fuel starvation and consequently fuel cell damage.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: Mitigating fuel starvation and improving load following capabilities are conflicting control objectives.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: However, the issue can be addressed by the hybridization of the system with an energy storage device.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: In this paper, a steady-state property of the SOFC, combined with a current regulation strategy, is used to manage transient fuel utilization and thereby address fuel starvation.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: Meanwhile, an overall system strategy is employed to manage energy sharing in the hybrid system for load following as well as for maintaining the state-of-charge of the energy storage device.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: This work presents an adaptive control algorithm that uses online parameter estimation to update the controller.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System

Sentencas: The control design is validated on a hardware-in-the-loop setup and experimental results are provided.
Titulo: Adaptive Control of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ultra-Capacitor Hybrid System
